tool_description: Tools to help people wishing to scrape websites.
name: Scraper tools
title: Scraper tools

api_list.name: /scrapeLinksFromURL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scraper-tools1.p.rapidapi.com/scrapeLinksFromURL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scraper-tools1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
